**Invitation to the Seller Portal ----------------------------------------------------
Hello {{{Seller_Communication__c.Contact__c}}},
As mentioned in our last conversation, you have been kindly invited to use coupon promotions on the Seller Portal.
The Seller Portal helps your business manage coupon promotions that eBay has invited you to join.
To access the portal, click the following button and sign in with your eBay credentials.
To the Growth Portal < https://sellerportal.ebay.com/ >
Best regards,
Your eBay team
This email was sent by Ebay, Inc. Ebay will never ask you to provide confidential information (like your password or credit card details) via email.
